Riskxd,
Shogun is NOT an ancient Japanese book.
However, if you like the st=
yle, you will probably like Musashi,  
Taiko, Heike Monogatari and the 47 R=
onin Story.
The first three are translations of Eiji Yoshikawa's Japanese v=
ersions.
These are all historical novels, thou, NOT history books.

Cepo
